title: Practical examinations for subjects at 2021 A/Ls to be held soon
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Examinations states that practical examinations related to the Information Technology subject of the 2021 Advanced Level Examination will be conducted soon.
However, the Commissioner General of Examinations, L.M.D. Dharmasena stated that the practical examinations for the subject of drama and the performing arts will begin on 29th April.
Meanwhile, Commissioner of Buddhist Affairs Sunanda Kariyapperuma stated that the previously postponed Dhamma School examinations will be held tomorrow (24).
